      class  CheckBox
      Single checkbox field.
      class  ComboBox
      A combobox control with support for autocomplete, remote-loading, paging and many other features.
      class  DateField
      Provides a date input field with a DatePicker dropdown and automatic date validation.
      class  Display
      A display-only text field which is not validated and not submitted.
      class  File
      A display-only text field which is not validated and not submitted.
      class  Hidden
      A basic hidden field for storing hidden values in forms that need to be passed in the form submit.
      class  HtmlEditor
      Provides a lightweight HTML Editor component.
      class  MultiSlider
      Slider which supports vertical or horizontal orientation, keyboard adjustments, configurable snapping, axis clicking and animation.
      class  NumberField
      A numeric text field that provides automatic keystroke filtering to disallow non-numeric characters, and numeric validation to limit the value to a range of valid numbers.
      class  Picker
      An abstract class for fields that have a single trigger which opens a "picker" popup below the field, e.g.
      class  Radio
      Single radio field.
      class  Slider
      Slider which supports vertical or horizontal orientation, keyboard adjustments, configurable snapping, axis clicking and animation.
      class  Spinner
      A field with a pair of up/down spinner buttons.
      class  TextArea
      Multiline text field.
      class  TextField
      A basic text field.
      class  TimeField
      Provides a time input field with a time dropdown and automatic time validation.
      class  TriggerField
      Provides a convenient wrapper for TextFields that adds a clickable trigger button (looks like a combobox by default).
